name: CluckMageddon: Rise of the Chickens
description: In a world where a giant chicken is terrorizing the citizens of a small rural village, it is up to you, the player, to do what no one else can: defeat the mutant chicken once and for all. This epic adventure will test the skill level of players in a clash between humans, mutant slimes illegally crossing Ronald Grump's border wall, and giant chickens invading the nation. You will experience an adventure filled with memorable characters, hilarious jokes, and a giant chicken that just won't give up. Just until your fingers weaken will the chicken begin to lose its might in this epic battle of strength, endurance, and patience.
